game.name: Doodle Derby
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Full controller support, Includes level editor, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 괴물 원숭이! 로켓! 피라냐! UFO! 상상도 못 할 경주 트랙을 건설해보세요. 친구들에게 도전하거나 혼자서 트랙을 박살 내세요. 펑펑 터지고 반칙이 난무하는 경주에서 과연 결승선까지 갈 수 있을까요? Doodle Derby는 재미있는 트랙을 만들 수 있는 짓궂은 물리 플랫폼 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Monster Apes! Rockets! Piranhas! UFOs! Build the most insane race tracks ever. Challenge your friends or CRACK A TRACK on your own. Can you make it to the finish line in an explosive race without rules?

reviewHighlights.text: There is a horrid, aggressive, flashing, full-screen, red and yellow flash that lasts a second or two every time you damage your car significantly. Yo...
I really like to play this game with some beers and friends.
